meanings.definition: Of or relating to the nostrils
meanings.sent1: The narial opening of the bird helped it breathe.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the patient's narial passages.
meanings.sent3: The narial sensitivity of the dog made it a great tracker.
meanings.sent4: The narial scent of the flower attracted bees from afar.
meanings.sent5: The narial congestion made it hard for the child to sleep.

meanings.definition: Having to do with the nasal passages
meanings.sent1: She felt a tickle in her narial cavity.
meanings.sent2: The singer's narial voice sounded congested.
meanings.sent3: The narial congestion caused funny sounds when he spoke.
meanings.sent4: His narial tone resonated through the room.
meanings.sent5: The narial spray cleared his stuffy nose instantly.

meanings.definition: Located near or on the nose
meanings.sent1: The glasses rested on her narial bridge.
meanings.sent2: The narial hair caught the sunlight beautifully.
meanings.sent3: His narial freckles made him look unique.
meanings.sent4: The narial jewelry sparkled in the light.
meanings.sent5: The narial twitch indicated his discomfort.
